definition: to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: The mapper trapped in the gap tapped the tap wrapper with strap.
sentences.chinese: 陷在縫中的製圖者用皮帶輕擊塞子套套。

sentences.english: The elastic nature of the condom also adds pressure to the mix.
sentences.chinese: 套套的彈性還可以在這些碎布上施加壓力。

sentences.english: A condom can allow you to make a bandage to stop bleeding in an emergency situation.
sentences.chinese: 在緊急情況下你可將套套做成繃帶用來止血。

sentences.english: Johnny tried to pull the turnip up. He sang.
sentences.chinese: 把蘿蔔頭的頭套套在某個學生頭上，假裝要拔他，說。

sentences.english: Much to my disappointment, his penis was so small the condom wouldn't stay on.
sentences.chinese: 非常令人失望，它的弟弟非常小甚至連套套都穿不住。

sentences.english: A condom can make a floatation device large enough to float small items.
sentences.chinese: 套套可作爲一種漂浮裝置承載小型物件。

sentences.english: Can I get a case for that?
sentences.chinese: 我能因此再得個套套嗎？

sentences.english: Some people prefer thinner condoms that allow for more sensation.
sentences.chinese: 有些人喜歡可以帶來更多感受的超薄套套。

sentences.english: That the presentation of this beautiful, hanbok attract a lot of people.
sentences.chinese: 大長今裏那一套套美麗的韓服吸引了不少人。

sentences.english: A condom can be used to keep fire making material dry in wet weather or environments.
sentences.chinese: 套套可以讓易燃物品在潮溼天氣或環境中保持乾爽。

definition: sterilized absorbent cotton wool (used for dressings or cleansing wounds)/sanitary napkin/tampon
